title: Corporate sales Professional
tagsAndSkills: Corporate sales,Lead generation,Field Sales Executive,Territory Management,Sales,Field sales,Territory,Generation
jobDescription:
1)The profile pertains to sales of branded or white labelled Green / Herbal / Auyrvedic teas to B2B clients with a focus on corporate in the BPO, KPO, Media sector multinational companies with employee count of over 1000.

2)While job location is predominantly is Mumbai Metropolitan region, Job role demands you to travel either to find new clients or to maintain relationships with the customers

3)You should have experience in working with HR/Admin/Purchase functions of potential client companies and are expected to have existing relationships with them

4)You are expected to be in constant and regular touch with your client base by means of telephonic or physical meetings and generate regular sales

5)You are expected to posses good negotiation skills manadatory to have favorable and quick closures

6)Generate business leads for the company from corporate, institutional offices and also prepare and maintain statistical data and provide reports as per company policies.

7)While your job requires extensive presence in market you are expected to attend office few days a week for updates and reporting.

8)This is a target based job with variable Pay and incentives. Adherance to sales number is mandatory.

Candidate Profile

1. Negotiation

2. Closing Sales

3. Convincing skill

4. Mandatory to have a laptop.

5.Mandatory to have fluency in English communication.

title: Presales Lead-  Test Effort estimation + Banking : Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: software testing,automation testing,Presales,bid management,proposal management,presentation skills,business development,Test Effort Estimation
jobDescription:
Qualitykiosk Technologies is looking for Presales Lead - Banking and Capital Markets.

Domain: BFSI ( broking / capital markets clients)


Mandatory criteria

Pre-sales / Testing / process automation services in Banking (Retail Banking, Corporate banking) & Capital Markets (Broking, Trading firms, Stock Exchanges) is needed


Work Location: Mumbai


We are open to consider candidates who wish to relocate to Mumbai.


Interested candidates pls share your resume on deepa.radhakrishnani@qualitykiosk.com


POSITION STATEMENT:


Pre-Sales Lead should have the ability to manage and work with disparate teams, create end to end solutions that meet the client requirements, as well as defend the solution with all the internal and external stakeholders. Opportunity to be a Thought Leader on Shift Left + Shift Right


REQUIRED COMPETENCIES AND EXPERIENCE;


  • Client handling experience is essential.
  • Should have handled large client projects, preferably onsite / in client premises
  • Good articulation, impeccable presentation and analysis skills is a must for the role.
  • Pre-sales / Testing / process automation services in Banking (Retail Banking, Corporate banking) & Capital Markets (Broking, Trading firms, Stock Exchanges) is needed
  • Good Command over written and spoken English
  • Hands on experience in Testing / Test Automation for at least 5 years would be preferred.
  • Experience working with testing tools / platforms.
  • Experience in pre-sales, proposal making, presenting the solutions to the clients would be an added advantage.
  • Hands on bid management or proposal management experience would be added advantage .

Greetings From "APEX SERVICES"

Role- Relationship Manager/Equity Dealer/HNI Dealer
